class txEvent : public txThrdBase

#include "txevent.h"

Public Interface
txEvent ~txEvent wait
wait trigger

Public Interface

txEvent( const char* name = default ) ;
~txEvent( ) ;
int wait( unsigned long timeout ) ;
void wait( ) ;
void trigger( ) ;

class txEventQueue : public txThrdBase

#include "txeventq.h"

Public Interface
txEventQueue txEventQueue ~txEventQueue
put put get
get registerQueue unregisterQueue
entries flush

Public Interface

txEventQueue( int high = 0 , int low = 0 ) ;
txEventQueue( txQueue* queue , int high = 0 , int low = 0 ) ;
~txEventQueue( ) ;
int put( void* message , unsigned long time = 0 ) ;
int put( txQueue* queue ) ;
int get( void*& message , unsigned long time = 0 ) ;
int get( txQueue* queue , int num = 0 ) ;
int registerQueue( txQueue* queue ) ;
int unregisterQueue( txQueue*& queue ) ;
int entries( ) ;
void flush( ) ;

locked

class txNativeThread

#include "txthread.h"

Public Interface
start priority priority
id name name
yield yield yield
yield

Public Interface

static void start( TX_THREAD_FUNC func , void* context = 0 , const char* name = default , int priority = DEFAULT_PRIORITY , int stack_size = DEFAULT_STACK_SIZE ) ;
static int priority( ) ;
static int priority( int pri ) ;
static unsigned long id( ) ;
static const char* name( ) ;
static const char* name( const char* name ) ;
static void yield( ) ;
static void yield( txNativeEvent& event ) ;
static void yield( unsigned long time ) ;
static int yield( txNativeEvent& event , unsigned long time ) ;

Public Data

static const int DEFAULT_PRIORITY;
static const int DEFAULT_STACK_SIZE;

class txThread

#include "txthread.h"

Public Interface
start priority priority
id name name
yield yield yield
yield schedule

Public Interface

static void start( TX_THREAD_FUNC func , void* context = 0 , const char* name = default , int priority = DEFAULT_PRIORITY , int stack_size = DEFAULT_STACK_SIZE ) ;
static int priority( ) ;
static int priority( int pri ) ;
static unsigned long id( ) ;
static const char* name( ) ;
static const char* name( const char* name ) ;
static void yield( ) ;
static void yield( txEvent& event ) ;
static void yield( unsigned long time ) ;
static int yield( txEvent& event , unsigned long time ) ;
         for experience users
static void schedule( ) ;

Public Data

static const int DEFAULT_PRIORITY;
static const int DEFAULT_STACK_SIZE;
<< • toc

class txThreadManager : public txThrdBase

#include "txthrdmgr.h"

Public Interface
txThreadManager ~txThreadManager priority
numberOfThreads numberOfWorkNodes numberOfActiveWorkNodes
start

Public Interface

txThreadManager( int priority , const char* name = default , int min_threads = 2 , int max_threads = 5 , int low_water_mark = 0 , int high_water_mark = 0 ) ;
~txThreadManager( ) ;
int priority( ) ;
int numberOfThreads( ) ;
int numberOfWorkNodes( ) ;
int numberOfActiveWorkNodes( ) ;
void start( TX_THREAD_FUNC func , void* context = 0 , const char* name = default , int priority = txThread::DEFAULT_PRIORITY , int stack = txThread::DEFAULT_STACK_SIZE ) ;
